anyOf.description: check can be a JSON-schema to validate the source data
check can be a function that will be passed the source data

___fixable.description: is either "api" or "pr" if the --fix option on the command line automatically fixes problems reported by the rule with API call or with PR

___name.description: rule name as used in config (should be the same as file name)

___description.description: provides the short description of the rule in the rules index

___recommended.description: whether the "extends": "ghlint:recommended" property in a configuration file enables the rule

___category.description: specifies the heading under which the rule is listed in the rules index

___source.description: source of information the rule operates on
